Title: Loving in Tandem
Writer: Kristine Gabriel (story), Kristine Gabriel (screenplay), Anjanette Haw (screenplay)
Actors: Maymay Entrata, Edward Barber, Kisses Delavin, Marco Gallo
Plot: Shine (Maymay Entrata) is a jolly and happy-go-lucky girl who will do anything for her family. But when it comes to love. she hopelessly finds one, and wishes to meet her one true love. ...
